name: Arberry
text: Alif Lam Ra. Those are the signs of the Book and of a manifest Koran.

name: Arberry
text: Perchance the unbelievers will wish that they had surrendered:

name: Arberry
text: leave them to eat, and to take their joy, and to be bemused by hope; certainly they will soon know!

name: Arberry
text: Never a city have We destroyed, but it had a known decree,

name: Arberry
text: and no nation outstrips its term, nor do they put it back.

name: Arberry
text: They say: 'Thou, upon whom the Remembrance is sent down, thou art assuredly possessed!

name: Arberry
text: Why dost thou not bring the angels unto us, if thou speakest truly?'

name: Arberry
text: We send not down the angels, save with truth;

name: Arberry
text: then they would not be respited. It is We who have sent down the Remembrance, and We watch over it.

name: Arberry
text: Indeed, We sent Messengers before thee, among the factions of the ancients,

name: Arberry
text: and not a single Messenger came to them, but they mocked at him;

name: Arberry
text: even so We cause it to enter into the hearts of the sinners --

name: Arberry
text: they believe not in it, though the wont of the ancients is already gone.

name: Arberry
text: Though We opened to them a gate in heaven, and still they mounted through it,

name: Arberry
text: yet would they say, 'Our eyes have been dazzled; nay, we are a people bewitched!'

name: Arberry
text: We have set in heaven constellations and decked them out fair to the beholders,

name: Arberry
text: and guarded them from every accursed Satan

name: Arberry
text: excepting such as listens by stealth -- and he is pursued by a manifest flame.

name: Arberry
text: And the earth -- We stretched it forth, and cast on it firm mountains, and We caused to grow therein of every thing justly weighed,

name: Arberry
text: and there appointed for you livelihood, and for those you provide not for.

name: Arberry
text: Naught is there, but its treasuries are with Us, and We send it not down but in a known measure.

name: Arberry
text: And We loose the winds fertilising, and We send down out of heaven water, then We give it to you to drink, and you are not its treasurers.

name: Arberry
text: It is We who give life, and make to die, and it is We who are the inheritors.

name: Arberry
text: We know the ones of you who press forward, and We know the laggards;

name: Arberry
text: and it is thy Lord shall muster them, and He is All-wise, All-knowing.

name: Arberry
text: Surely We created man of a clay of mud moulded,

name: Arberry
text: and the jinn created We before of fire flaming.

name: Arberry
text: And when thy Lord said to the angels, 'See, I am creating a mortal of a clay of mud moulded.

name: Arberry
text: When I have shaped him, and breathed My spirit in him, fall you down, bowing before him!'

name: Arberry
text: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,

name: Arberry
text: save Iblis; he refused to be among those bowing.

name: Arberry
text: Said He, 'What ails thee, Iblis, that thou art not among those bowing?'

name: Arberry
text: Said he, 'I would never bow myself before a mortal whom Thou hast created of a clay of mud moulded.'

name: Arberry
text: Said He, 'Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.

name: Arberry
text: Upon thee shall rest the curse, till the Day of Doom.'

name: Arberry
text: Said he, 'My Lord, respite me till the day they shall be raised.'

name: Arberry
text: Said He, 'Thou art among the ones that are respited

name: Arberry
text: unto the day of a known time.'

name: Arberry
text: Said he, 'My Lord, for Thy perverting me I shall deck all fair to them in the earth, and I shall pervert them, all together,

name: Arberry
text: excepting those Thy servants among them that are devoted.

name: Arberry
text: Said He, 'This is for Me a straight path:

name: Arberry
text: over My servants thou shalt have no authority, except those that follow thee,

name: Arberry
text: being perverse; Gehenna shall be their promised land all together.

name: Arberry
text: Seven gates it has, and unto each gate a set portion of them belongs.'

name: Arberry
text: But the godfearing shall be amidst gardens and fountains:

name: Arberry
text: 'Enter you them, in peace and security!'

name: Arberry
text: We shall strip away all rancour that is in their breasts; as brothers they shall be upon couches set face to face;

name: Arberry
text: no fatigue there shall smite them, neither shall they ever be driven forth from there.

name: Arberry
text: Tell My servants I am the All-forgiving, the All-compassionate,

name: Arberry
text: and that My chastisement is the painful chastisement.

name: Arberry
text: And tell them of the guests of Abraham,

name: Arberry
text: when they entered unto him, saying, 'Peace!' He said, 'Behold, we are afraid of you.'

name: Arberry
text: They said, 'Be not afraid; behold, we give thee good tidings of a cunning boy.'

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'What, do you give me good tidings, though old age has smitten me? Of what do you

name: Arberry
text: give me good tidings?' They said, 'We give thee good tidings of truth. Be not of those that despair.'

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord, excepting those that are astray?'

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'And what is your business, envoys?'

name: Arberry
text: They said, 'We have been sent unto a people of sinners,

name: Arberry
text: excepting the folk of Lot; them we shall deliver

name: Arberry
text: all together, excepting his wife -- we have decreed, she shall surely be of those that tarry.'

name: Arberry
text: So, when the envoys came to the folk of Lot,

name: Arberry
text: he said, 'Surely you are a people unknown to me!'

name: Arberry
text: They said, 'Nay, but we have brought thee that concerning which they were doubting.

name: Arberry
text: We have come to thee with the truth, and assuredly we speak truly.

name: Arberry
text: So set forth, thou with thy family, in a watch of the night, and follow after the backs of them, and let not any one of you turn round; and depart unto the place you are commanded.'

name: Arberry
text: And We decreed for him that commandment, that the last remnant of those should be cut off in the morning.

name: Arberry
text: And the people of the city came rejoicing.

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'These are my guests; put me not to shame,

name: Arberry
text: and fear God, and do not degrade me.'

name: Arberry
text: They said, 'Have we not forbidden thee all beings?'

name: Arberry
text: He said, 'These are my daughters, if you would be doing.'

name: Arberry
text: By thy life, they wandered blindly in their dazzlement,

name: Arberry
text: and the Cry seized them at the sunrise,

name: Arberry
text: and We turned it uppermost nethermost and rained on it stones of baked clay.

name: Arberry
text: Surely in that are signs for such as mark;

name: Arberry
text: surely it is on a way yet remaining;

name: Arberry
text: surely in that is a sign for believers.

name: Arberry
text: Certainly the dwellers in the Thicket were evildoers,

name: Arberry
text: and We took vengeance on them. The two of them were upon a roadway manifest.

name: Arberry
text: The dwellers in El-Hijr cried lies to the Envoys.

name: Arberry
text: We brought them. Our signs, and they turned away from them.

name: Arberry
text: They were hewing the mountains into houses, therein dwelling securely;

name: Arberry
text: and the Cry seized them in the morning;

name: Arberry
text: that they earned did not avail them.

name: Arberry
text: We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, save in truth. Surely the Hour is coming; so pardon thou, with a gracious pardoning.

name: Arberry
text: Surely thy Lord, He is the All-creator, the All-knowing.

name: Arberry
text: We have given thee seven of the oft-repeated, and the mighty Koran.

name: Arberry
text: Stretch not thine eyes to that We have given pairs of them to enjoy; and do not sorrow for them, and lower thy wing unto the believers,

name: Arberry
text: and say, 'Surely, I am the manifest warner.'

name: Arberry
text: So We sent it down to the partitioners,

name: Arberry
text: who have broken the Koran into fragments.

name: Arberry
text: Now by thy Lord, We shall surely question them all together

name: Arberry
text: concerning that they were doing.

name: Arberry
text: So shout that thou art commanded and turn thou away from the idolaters.

name: Arberry
text: We suffice thee against the mockers,

name: Arberry
text: even against those who set up with God another god. Certainly they will soon know!

name: Arberry
text: We know indeed thy breast is straitened by the things they say.

name: Arberry
text: Proclaim thy Lord's praise, and be of those that bow,

name: Arberry
text: and serve thy Lord, until the Certain comes to thee.
